zhValue: 向更多的人群推广获得加密货币的有效途径
enValue: Promote effective ways to obtain cryptocurrency to more people

zhValue: 让矿工和电力公司双赢，开创新时代的矿工革命
enValue: Let miners and power companies win-win, and create a new era of miner revolution

zhValue: 盈算力是由注册于塞舌尔的国际加密资产投资管理公司Mineprofit投资的去中心化算力投资平台。
enValue: Mineprofit is a decentralized hashrate investment platform invested by Mineprofit, an international crypto asset investment management company registered in Seychelles.

zhValue:
普通人由于受到矿机场地、电力资源、计算机硬件运维的技术限制从而很难加入到加密货币矿工行列中，
    但盈算力则让普通人圆了矿工梦。盈算力的云端托管技术让矿工只需直接在盈算力购买算力进行挖矿，无需承担任何的矿机运维工作，有效降低了用户的投资门槛。
enValue:
Ordinary people are difficult to join the ranks of cryptocurrency miners due to technical restrictions on mining sites, power resources, and computer hardware operation and maintenance.
    But the profitability has made ordinary people realize the dream of a miner. The cloud hosting technology of Yinghash allows miners to purchase hashrate directly from Yinghash for mining without having to undertake any operation and maintenance of mining machines, which effectively reduces the investment threshold for users.

zhValue:
Mineprofit拥有十几年世界各地发电站投资背景。因此与普通数字矿业不同，盈算力与世界各地拥有剩余电力的发电站和当地的电气公司合作，通过搭建与整合中型数字矿场，
    具备智能电价计费模式，并通过支付分红给投资者和电力提供方达到真正的全赢目标。
enValue:
Mineprofit has more than ten years of investment background in power stations all over the world. Therefore, unlike ordinary digital mining, Yingbaili cooperates with power stations with surplus power and local electric companies around the world to build and integrate medium-sized digital mines.
    Equipped with a smart electricity price billing model, and through the payment of dividends to investors and power providers to achieve a true win-win goal.
Ensure the safety of miners' assets
Easily realize the trading of hashrate

zhValue: Mineprofit拥有十几年世界各地发电站投资背景。
enValue: Mineprofit has more than ten years of investment background in power stations all over the world.

zhValue: 目前合作电站主要分布在哈萨克斯坦、乌兹别克斯坦、中国、格鲁吉亚、加拿大
enValue: At present, cooperative power stations are mainly distributed in Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, China, Georgia, and Canada

zhValue: Mineprofit算力生态圈由“算力交易市场”和“算力质押市场”组成，实现矿场、投资者和电力公司三方共赢目标，算力生态圈让用户能够：
enValue: The Mineprofit hashrate ecosystem is composed of a "hashrate trading market" and a "hashrate pledge market". It achieves the trilateral win-win goal of mines, investors, and power companies. The hashrate ecosystem allows users to:
Income growth rate can reach 2.4 times

zhValue: Mineprofit算力交易市场拥有“官方自营算力”+“C2C算力交易”的线上双选交易模式，打造高度自由的算力交易系统。
enValue: The Mineprofit hashrate trading market has an online dual selection trading mode of "official self-operated hashrate" + "C2C hashrate trading", creating a highly free hashrate trading system.

zhValue: 用户可以在“C2C算力交易市场”购买他人算力或出售自身持有算力，做到完全自由的算力交易，让用户在挖矿的同时还能享受算力溢价，使用户收益倍增。
enValue: Users can buy other people's hashrate or sell their own hashrate in the "C2C hashrate trading market" to achieve completely free hashrate transactions, allowing users to enjoy hashrate premiums while mining, so that users' income will be doubled.

zhValue: Mineprofit算力质押市场打造点对点的算力质押体系，邀请人可寻找投资者将闲置算力进行质押，从而有效提高邀请人的算力产出，让投资者拥有稳定的月化收益。
enValue: The Mineprofit hashrate pledge market creates a peer-to-peer hashrate pledge system. The inviter can find investors to pledge idle hashrate, thereby effectively increasing the inviter's hashrate output and allowing investors to have stable monthly income.

zhValue: 循环检测邀请人质押算力价值
enValue: Cycle testing invites to pledge hashrate value
